verses.1: Mi thahatpa aw, bang hangin miphate suksiatna ah kisial na hi hiam? Sun thapai-in, suksiatna na ngaih sunsun hi.
verses.2: Zuau nasem pa aw, na leii a hiam pha mahmah mulkiatna tem tawh kibang hi.
verses.3: Hoihna sangin siatna na deih zaw a, thuman genna sangin zuauna na deih zaw hi.
verses.4: Mi a khem thei pa aw, a siasak thei kammal khempeuh deih belin na nei hi.
verses.5: Tua ahih manin Pasian in nang hong susia paisuak ding hi. Amah in nang hong bawhin na buk sung panin hong kai khia dinga, a hingteʼ leitang panin hong zunglot ding hi.
verses.6: Thuman mite in nang hong mu-in, lau mahmah ding uh a, nang hong nuihsanin,
verses.7: “Pasian a beel lo, ama hauhnate a muang, ama hauhna a beel pa en un,” hong ci ding uh hi.
verses.8: Ahih hangin kei ka hih leh Pasianʼ inn sunga a om oliv kung a hing tawh ka kibang hi. Pasianʼ itna kip ka muang ngitnget hi.
verses.9: Hih bangin keimah hong bawl khin na hih manin nangma tungah ka lungdam ngitnget ding hi. Thuhoih ahih manin miphate omna ah nangma min ka taangko ding hi.
